name: Tennisplätze Hotel Strass

address.name: Sport & Spa Hotel Strass Roscher KG

description: In Fun & Spa Hotel Strass in Mayrhofen there are lots of entertainment options available. For sport and games there are numerous facilities available indoors and outdoors, and a programme of events. You can try the Techno-Gym equipment and play squash, tennis, snooker, Pit-Pat (mini-golf played with a snooker cue) or table tennis. There is also a play station and computer games. Take advantage of the special varieties on offer for fitness and fun during your summer holiday, and also try some of the wellness and beauty facilities!
